content: monday cable cowl an easy cable cowl perfect for beginners pattern notes sizing this cowl is designed with knitters new to the cowl has an approximate circumference of circular needles and cable knitting in mind 66 cm and length of 23 cm some variation is expected due to differences in knitting gauge it is worked in the round and features a simple and yarn cable pattern repeat with cable stitches worked only every 4th round materials it is worked in a dk 8 ply yarn held double yarn and yardage choose a dk 8 ply yarn with an approximate it is named after a monday lunchtime knitting gauge of 22 stitches and 30 row to 10 cm the circle for beginner knitters yarn is held double that is worked with two difficulty level strands of yarn held together beginner you will need about 200 m if your yarn is in one large skein wind half of it into a second ball so you can hold the yarn double 1 | © kiniki knits 2026 needles first step -
